sanskrit_text: अग्निमीळे पुरोहितं यज्ञस्य देवमृत्विजम् । होतारं रत्नधातमम् ॥
transliteration: agním īḷe purohitaṁ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam | hotāraṁ ratna-dhātamam ||
translation_english: I praise Agni, the household priest, the divine officiant of the sacrifice, the invoker who bestows the greatest wealth.

sanskrit_text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिरृषिभिरीड्यो नूतनैरुत । स देवाँ एह वक्षति ॥
transliteration: agniḥ pūrvebhir ṛṣibhir īḍyo nūtanair uta | sa devān eha vakṣati ||
translation_english: Agni, worthy of praise by ancient seers and by the modern ones, shall bring the gods here.

sanskrit_text: अग्निना रयिमश्नवत्पोषमेव दिवेदिवे । यशसं वीरवत्तमम् ॥
transliteration: agninā rayim aśnavat poṣam eva dive-dive | yaśasaṁ vīravattamam ||
translation_english: Through Agni one gains wealth and nourishment day by day, glorious and rich in heroic sons.

sanskrit_text: अग्ने यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि । स इद्देवेषु गच्छति ॥
transliteration: agne yaṁ yajñam adhvaraṁ viśvataḥ paribhūr asi | sa id deveṣu gacchati ||
translation_english: O Agni, the sacrifice that you encompass on every side, that alone goes to the gods.

sanskrit_text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः । देवो देवेभिरागमत् ॥
transliteration: agnir hotā kavikratuḥ satyaś citraśravastamaḥ | devo devebhir āgamat ||
translation_english: Agni, the priest with inspired wisdom, truthful and of most radiant fame—may the god come with the gods.

sanskrit_text: यदङ्ग दाशुषे त्वमग्ने भद्रं करिष्यसि । तवेत्तत्सत्यमङ्गिरः ॥
transliteration: yad aṅga dāśuṣe tvam agne bhadraṁ kariṣyasi | tavet tat satyam aṅgiraḥ ||
translation_english: Whatever good you will do for the giver, O Agni, that is indeed true of you, O Angiras.

sanskrit_text: उप त्वाग्ने दिवेदिवे दोषावस्तर्धिया वयम् । नमो भरन्त एमसि ॥
transliteration: upa tvāgne dive-dive doṣāvastar dhiyā vayam | namo bharanta emasi ||
translation_english: To you, O Agni, day after day, at dusk and dawn, we approach with reverence, bearing homage.

sanskrit_text: राजन्तमध्वराणां गोपामृतस्य दीदिवम् । वर्धमानं स्वे दमे ॥
transliteration: rājantam adhvarāṇāṁ gopām ṛtasya dīdivam | vardhamānaṁ sve dame ||
translation_english: Shining as the king of sacrifices, the guardian of cosmic order, radiant and growing in his own dwelling.

sanskrit_text: स नः पितेव सूनवेऽग्ने सूपायनो भव । सचस्वा नः स्वस्तये ॥
transliteration: sa naḥ piteva sūnave agne sūpāyano bhava | sacasvā naḥ svastaye ||
translation_english: Be to us like a father to his son, O Agni—easy of access. Abide with us for our well-being.

sanskrit_text: वायवा याहि दर्शतेमे सोमा अरंकृताः । तेषां पाहि श्रुधी हवम् ॥
transliteration: vāyavā yāhi darśateme somā araṃkṛtāḥ | teṣāṃ pāhi śrudhī havam ||
translation_english: O beautiful Vāyu, come: these Soma drops are prepared. Drink of them; hear our call.

sanskrit_text: वाय उक्थेभिर् जरन्ते सोमासश्चक्रिरे दिवि । यज्ञो देवेषु गच्छति ॥
transliteration: vāya ukthebhir jarante somāsaś cakrire divi | yajño deveṣu gacchati ||
translation_english: Knowing the days, with Soma juice poured forth, the singers glorify you, O Vāyu, with hymns of praise.

sanskrit_text: वायो तव प्रप्रथिता धारा दिवा नृभ्यः । याभिः सीदसि दाशुषे ॥
transliteration: vāyo tava praprathitā dhārā divā nṛbhyaḥ | yābhiḥ sīdasi dāśuṣe ||
translation_english: Vāyu, your far-spreading, penetrating stream goes forth to the worshipper who offers sacrifice.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रवायू इमे सुता उप प्रयाणि दध्महे । ते यज्ञं यासथो गतम् ॥
transliteration: indravāyū ime sutā upa prayāṇi dadhmahe | te yajñaṃ yāsatho gatam ||
translation_english: Indra-Vāyu, these Soma drops are poured for you: come for the sake of our offered dainties.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रवायू हवामहे यातमुप प्र यच्छतम् । मध्वः सोमस्य पीतये ॥
transliteration: indravāyū havāmahe yātam upa pra yacchatam | madhvaḥ somasya pītaye ||
translation_english: Well do you mark libations, O Vāyu and Indra, rich in spoil; so come swiftly hitherward.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रवायू उप व्रजं सोमस्य गन्तनं । त्वा हवामहे सुहवम् ॥
transliteration: indravāyū upa vrajaṃ somasya gantanam | tvā havāmahe suhavām ||
translation_english: Vāyu and Indra, come to what the Soma-presser has prepared: soon, heroes, thus I make my prayer.

sanskrit_text: मित्रं हुवे पूतदक्षं वरुणं च रिशादसम् । धियं घृताचीं साधयन् ॥
transliteration: mitraṃ huve pūtadakṣaṃ varuṇaṃ ca riśādasam | dhiyaṃ ghṛtācīṃ sādhayan ||
translation_english: Mitra of holy strength I call, and foe-destroying Varuṇa, who make the oil-fed rite complete.

sanskrit_text: मित्रा वरुणा महान्ता ऋतेन यज्ञमाशाथे । तौ नः पान्तु सुक्रतू ॥
transliteration: mitrā varuṇā mahāntā ṛtena yajñam āśāthe | tau naḥ pāntu sukratū ||
translation_english: Mitra and Varuṇa, through Law, lovers and cherishers of Law, we have obtained your mighty power.

sanskrit_text: मित्रावरुणा सुव्रतौ बलं नः सुप्रजास्त्वम् । वर्धयन्तौ न आयुषा ॥
transliteration: mitrāvaruṇā suvratau balaṃ naḥ suprajāstvām | vardhayantau na āyuṣā ||
translation_english: O Mitra-Varuṇa, wide in dominion and strong by birth, vouchsafe us strength that works aright.

sanskrit_text: सुरूपकृत्नुमूतये सुदुघामिव गोदुहे । जुहूमसि द्यविद्यवि ॥
transliteration: surūpakṛtnumūtaye sudughāmiva goduhe | juhūmasi dyavidyavi ||
translation_english: Day by day we invoke for our aid the one of beautiful form, like a milkman calls a good‑milking cow.

sanskrit_text: उप नः सवना गहि सोमस्य सोमपाः पिब । गोदा इद्रेवतो मदः ॥
transliteration: upa naḥ savanā gahi somasya somapāḥ piba | godā idrevato madaḥ ||
translation_english: O drinker of Soma, come to our offerings and drink the Soma; the intoxication of the glorious one is indeed wealth‑giving.

sanskrit_text: अथा ते अन्तमानां विद्याम सुमतीनाम् । मा नो अति ख्य आ गहि ॥
transliteration: athā te antamānāṃ vidyāṃ sumatīnām | mā no ati khyā ā gahi ||
translation_english: Then may we, who are near you, know your benevolent intentions; do not disregard us, come hither.

sanskrit_text: परेहि विग्रमस्तृतमिन्द्रं पृच्छा विपश्चितम् । यस्ते सखिभ्य आ वरम् ॥
transliteration: parehi vigramastṛtam indraṃ pṛcchā vipaścitam | yaste sakhibhya ā varam ||
translation_english: Go and ask of Indra, the wise and unconquered hero, him who is best to your friends.

sanskrit_text: उत ब्रुवन्तु नो निदो निरन्यतश्चिदारत । दधाना इन्द्र इद्दुवः ॥
transliteration: uta bruvantu no nido niraṇyataścidārata | dadhānā indra idduvaḥ ||
translation_english: Whether those who mock us say we lack restraint, or not, ye who serve Indra and none else.

sanskrit_text: उत नः सुभगाँ अरिर्वोचेयुर्दस्म कृष्टयः । स्यामेदिन्द्रस्य शर्मणि ॥
transliteration: uta naḥ subhagāṁ arir voceyurdasma kṛṣṭayaḥ | syāmedindrasya śarmaṇi ||
translation_english: Let those who serve Indra with praise be free from blame; may we be in Indra’s grace and protection.

sanskrit_text: एம्वामशुर्वाज॑य॒यं सहस्रि॑णं पु॒रुष्टुतम् । इन्द्रं सहस्रसातमम् ॥
transliteration: emvāmaśurvājayayaṃ sahasriṇaṃ puruṣṭutam | indraṃ sahasrasātamam ||
translation_english: We praise the glorious, thousand‑fold, much‑praised Indra, the greatest winner of a thousand spoils.

sanskrit_text: नू चित्सहोजा अमृतो न तून्दते । होतार यद् दूतः अभवत् ॥
transliteration: nū citsahojā amṛto na tundate | hotā yad dūtaḥ abhavat ||
translation_english: Now, the immortal one, born of strength, does not fail when he becomes the messenger of the Hotri priest.

sanskrit_text: इमा उ त्वा पुरूवसो गिरो वर्धन्तु या मम । पावकवर्णा उच्चयो वि पचिता वि पश्यिता ॥
transliteration: imā u tvā purūvaso giro vardhantu yā mama | pāvakavarṇā uccayo vi pacitā vi paśyitā ||
translation_english: O you of many riches, may these praises of mine strengthen you — praises that are pure, purifying, and wise.

sanskrit_text: यस्या त्वमिन्द्र स्तोमेṣu इह श्रुण्वते महे । सद्यः वर्धस्व सुवीर्यः ॥
transliteration: yasyā tvam indra stomeṣu iha śruṇvate mahe | sadyaḥ vardhasva suvīryaḥ ||
translation_english: O Indra, you who are great, listen to our praises here; grow immediately in strength and heroism.

sanskrit_text: आ त्वेतानि सदीदं विषवे ऋचा वाग्भिः प्र गायत । सखायः स्तोमवाहसः ॥
transliteration: ā tvetāni sadīdaṃ viśave ṛcā vāgbhiḥ pra gāyata | sakhāyaḥ stomavāhasaḥ ||
translation_english: Come hither with these thoughts, O Indra, sung by all the hymns and voiced by our choirs, O friends bearing the stoma.

sanskrit_text: पुरूतमं पुरूणाम् ईशानं वार्याणाम् इन्द्रं सोमे सचा सुते ।
transliteration: purūtamaṃ purūṇām īśānaṃ vāryāṇām indraṃ some sacā sute ||
translation_english: Indra, lord of the abundant, the ruler of all glories, come with the Soma and partake of the pressed juice.

sanskrit_text: स॒ घा नो॒ योग॒ आ भु॑वत् स रा॒ये स पुर॑न्ध्याम् । गम॒द्वाजे॑भि॒रा स न॑ः ॥
transliteration: sa gha no yoga ā bhuvat sa rāye sa purandhyām | gamadvājebhirā sa naḥ ||
translation_english: May he be for us the union of mind and action, the carrier of all wealth and power, the breaker of our foes.

sanskrit_text: यस्य संथे न वृण्वते हरिः समत्सु शत्रवः ।
transliteration: yasya saṃsthe na vṛṇvate hariḥ samatsu śatravaḥ ||
translation_english: In whose presence the foes cannot stand, in the gathering of the good, let him be ours.

sanskrit_text: मा नो मर्ता अभि द्रुहन्त नूनामिन्द्र गिर्वणः । ईशानो यवया वधम् ॥
transliteration: mā no martā abhi druḥanta nūnām indra girvaṇaḥ | īśāno yavyāya vadham ||
translation_english: Let not mortals who insult this word harm us, O Indra of swift speech, the powerful ruler against the host.

sanskrit_text: सुतस्य पीतये सद्यो वृद्धः अजायथाः । इन्द्र ज्यैष्ठ्याय सुक्रतो इति सुक्रतो ॥
transliteration: sutasya pītaye sadyo vṛddhaḥ ajāyathāḥ | indra jyaiṣṭhyāya sukṛto iti sukṛto ||
translation_english: For the drinking of the pressed Soma he was born increased, O Indra of mighty deeds, to be of supreme strength.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्र गिर्वणः सुतस्य पीतये अग्नयः आशवः । धियं तव प्रचेतसे ॥
transliteration: indra girvaṇaḥ sutasya pītaye agnayaḥ āśavaḥ | dhiyaṃ tava prachetase ||
translation_english: O Indra of swift speech, fiery and full of vigour, may the Soma streams bring peace to thy conscious mind.

sanskrit_text: अवीवृद्धं त्वां गीरः प्र गायत प्रार्थनाः । इन्द्र सहस्रिणं ते वर्धतु स्तोमाः ॥
transliteration: avī-vṛddhaṃ tvāṃ gīraḥ pra gāyata prārthanāḥ | indra sahasriṇaṃ te vardhatu stomāḥ ||
translation_english: May the hymns and our prayers increase thee, O Indra of a thousand powers.

sanskrit_text: अक्षितोतिः सहस्रिणं वाजं ते सनेदः । धृतम् अस्माकं वर्धयतु॥
transliteration: akṣitotiḥ sahasriṇaṃ vājaṃ te sanedaḥ | dhṛtam asmākaṃ vardhayatu ||
translation_english: May Indra, whose expansion knows no decay, uphold for us the thousand‑fold wealth in which our strength abides.

sanskrit_text: मा नो मर्ता अभि द्रुहन्तनूनामिन्द्र वायवेभ्यः । वाजेभिरापो गुरो वर्धन्तु ॥
transliteration: mā no martā abhi druḥantanūnām indra vāyavebhyaḥ | vājebhir āpo guro vardhantu ||
translation_english: Let not those who would harm us prevail; may Indra and the winds and waters increase our might.

sanskrit_text: युञ्जन्ति ब्रध्नमरुषं चरन्तं परि तस्थुषः । रोचन्ते रोचना दिवि ॥
transliteration: yuñjanti bradhnamaruṣaṃ carantaṃ pari tasthuṣaḥ | rocante rocana divi ||
translation_english: Around him stand those who yoke the great, storm‑like forces; they shine brilliantly in the sky.

sanskrit_text: युञ्जन्त्यस्य काम्या हरी विपक्षसा रथे । शोणा धृष्णू नृवाहसा ॥
transliteration: yuñjanty asya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe | śoṇā dhṛṣṇū nṛvāhasā ||
translation_english: They harness for him the desirable bay horses on either side of the chariot, with firm‑grasping reins.

sanskrit_text: केतुं कृण्वन्नकेतवे पेशो मर्या अपे्शसे । समुषद्भिरजायथाः ॥
transliteration: ketuṃ kṛṇvann ketave peśo maryā apeśase | samuṣadbhir ajāyathāḥ ||
translation_english: With them he creates a banner of glory; born together in shining brilliance, they have arisen.

sanskrit_text: आदह स्वधामनु पुनर्गर्भत्वमेरिरे । दधाना नाम यज्ञियम् ॥
transliteration: ādaha svadhāmanu punar garbhatvamerire | dadhānā nāma yajñiyam ||
translation_english: Then after the day of the offering they progress along their destined path, bearing the sacred Name of the rite.

sanskrit_text: वीळु चिदारुजत्नुभिर्गुहा चिदिन्द्र वह्निभिः । अविन्द उस्रिया अनु ॥
transliteration: vīḷu cidārujatnubhir guhā cidindra vahnibhiḥ | avinda usriyā anu ||
translation_english: Breakers even of what is firm and secret, with Indra and the storm‑fires they find the shining herds even in the cave.

sanskrit_text: देवयन्तो यथा मतिमच्छा विदद्वसुं गिरः । महामनूषत श्रुतम् ॥
transliteration: devayanto yathā matim acchā vidadvasuṃ giraḥ | mahāmanūśat śrutam ||
translation_english: Even as the worshipping singers praise him who finds wealth, the mighty One is heard resounding in the songs.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रेण सं हि दृक्षसे संजग्मानो अबिभ्युषा । मन्दू इति समाना वर्चसा ॥
transliteration: indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣase samjagmānaḥ abibhyuṣā | mandū iti samāna varcasā ||
translation_english: Together with Indra shalt thou behold those who travel with him, eager for union, equal in brilliance.

sanskrit_text: अनव्यद्यैर्भिद्युभिर्मखः सहस्वदर्चति । गणैरिन्द्रस्य काम्यैः ॥
transliteration: anavyadyair bhidyubhir makhaḥ sahasvad arcati | gaṇair indrasya kāmyaiḥ ||
translation_english: The troop of swift ones, strong and faultless, worship Indra with the bands he desires.

sanskrit_text: इतः वा सातिम इमहे दिवः वा पार्थिवात् । अधि इन्द्रम् महः वा रजसः ॥
transliteration: itaḥ vā sātim īmahe divaḥ vā pārthivāt | adhi indram mahaḥ vā rajasaḥ ||
translation_english: From this place, or from heaven, or from above the earth, we invoke Indra for conquest and great wealth.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रेण वाजमह्यमादधीत यज्ञश्रेष्ठः । वाजिनामुप सौम्यं वर्धताम् ॥
transliteration: indreṇa vājam a myām adadhīta yajña śreṣṭhaḥ | vājinām up saumyam vardhatām ||
translation_english: May the best of rituals bestowed by Indra prosper the host; may his blessings increase gently upon the worshippers.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रमिद्गाथिनो बृहदिन्द्रमर्केभिरर्किणः । इन्द्रं वाणीर्नूषत ॥
transliteration: indram id gāthino bṛhad indram arkebhir arkiṇaḥ | indraṃ vāṇīr anūṣata ||
translation_english: The chanters extol Indra with songs, the reciters of the Ṛk with prayers, and the priests with their sacred texts.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्र इद्धर्योः सचा संमिश्ला वचोयुजा । इन्द्रो वाज्री हिरण्ययः ॥
transliteration: indra iddharyoḥ sacā saṃmiślā vacoyujā | indro vājrī hiraṇyayāḥ ||
translation_english: Indra comes ever inseparably with his two bright steeds and the car yoked by the word; Indra the thunder‑armed, all resplendent.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रो दीर्घाय चक्षस आ सूर्यं रोहयद् दिवि । वि गोभिरद्रिमैरयत् ॥
transliteration: indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi | vi gobhir adrim airayat ||
translation_english: Indra, to render far vision, caused the sun to ascend into heaven, dispelling darkness with his radiant rays.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्र वाजेषु नोऽव सहस्रप्रधनेषु च ।
transliteration: indra vājeṣu noʼva sahasrapradhaneṣu ca ||
translation_english: O Indra, grant us victory in wealth and in battles where thousand spoils are won, through your bold might.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं नो वाजं सुचरमधनेषु च वयं हवामहे । अस्य भव अरिरोधन ॥
transliteration: indraṃ no vājaṃ sucaram adhaneṣu ca vayaṃ havāmahe | asya bhava arirodhana ||
translation_english: We invoke Indra for both modest and great wealth; make him our ally to overcome foes in conflict.

sanskrit_text: स नो वृषन्नमुं चरुं सत्रादावन्नपा वृधि । अस्मभ्यमप्रतिष्कुतः ॥
transliteration: sa no vṛṣann‑amum caruṃ satrādāvan‑napā vṛdhi | asmabhyam apratiṣkutaḥ ||
translation_english: Constant giver and mighty, pour down this bounty for us, O Indra; come forth unshielded to aid us.

sanskrit_text: तुंジェतुंジェ य उत्तरे स्तोमा इन्द्रस्य वज्रिणः । न विंधे अस्य सुष्टुतिम् ॥
transliteration: tuñje tuñje ya uttare stomā indrasya vajriṇaḥ | na vindhe asya suṣṭutim ||
translation_english: Still higher, at every strain of praise, rise Indra’s hymns; I find no laud that fully matches his glory.

sanskrit_text: वृषा यूथेव वंसगः कृष्टीरियर्त्योजसा । ईशानो अप्रतिष्कुतः ॥
transliteration: vṛṣā yūtheva vaṃsagaḥ kṛṣṭī‑iryartyojasā | īśāno apratiṣkutaḥ ||
translation_english: Like a stately bull driving the herds, he comes to the people with might — the irresistible lord.

sanskrit_text: य एकश्चर्षणीनां वसूनामिरज्यति । इन्द्रः पञ्च क्षितीनाम् ॥
transliteration: ya ekaś carṣaṇīnāṃ vasūnāmirajyati | indraḥ pañca kṣitīnām ||
translation_english: One who alone governs men and the gods and presides over all five regions, — that Indra we call forth.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रं वो विश्वतस्परि हवामहे जनेभ्यः । अस्माकमस्तु केवलः ॥
transliteration: indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ | asmākam astu kevalaḥ ||
translation_english: We invoke Indra, who is everywhere among men; may he be exclusively ours.

sanskrit_text: एन्द्र सानसिं रयिं सजित्वानं सदासहम् । वर्षिष्ठमूतये भरा ॥
transliteration: endra sānasiṃ rayiṃ sajitvānaṃ sadāsaham | varṣiṣṭham ūtaye bhara ||
translation_english: Indra, bring for our protection abundant wealth, delightful and supreme, the source of victory, humbling our foes.

sanskrit_text: ये वृत्रासो यजमानस्य न उवाचन्ति मदन्तः ।
transliteration: ye vṛtrāso yajamānasya na uvāchanti madantaḥ ||
translation_english: Those hostile to the sacrificer who do not speak boldly have been conquered by you.

sanskrit_text: ओ भूत इन्द्र वज्रेण आमिषां दधाय धिष्ण्या ।
transliteration: o bhūta indra vajreṇa āmiṣāṃ dadhāya dhiṣṇyā ||
translation_english: O Indra, with your thunderbolt may you establish our wishes with strong resolve.

sanskrit_text: वयं शूरेभिरस्तृभिरिन्द्र त्वया युजा वयम् ।
transliteration: vayaṃ śūrebhir astribhir indra tvayā yujā vayam ||
translation_english: By your support, O Indra, we, united with your brave weapons, conquer.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रेणैव युज्यमाना वाजेश्च वर्धताम् ।
transliteration: indreṇai va yujyamānā vājeś ca vardhatām ||
translation_english: May we, yoked with Indra, prosper in wealth upon your mighty strength.

sanskrit_text: यासां त्वा अग्रे यथाऽस्मादन्तरि विश्वे वषन्ति ।
transliteration: yāsāṃ tvā agre yathāʼsmād antari viśve vaṣanti ||
translation_english: As those whom you support prosper before us, so may all be brought under your sway.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रेण वृषांसि धेनवः स्म एव दधीत धरः ।
transliteration: indreṇa vṛṣāṃsi dhenavaḥ sma eva dadhīta dharaḥ ||
translation_english: O Indra, may bulls and cows be firmly established for us by your might.

sanskrit_text: आ नो वाजं सुपर्णा दधामा इन्द्र ज्यैष्ठ्याय ।
transliteration: ā no vājaṃ suparṇā dadhāmā indra jyaiṣṭhyāya ||
translation_english: Grant us abundant wealth, O Indra of splendid wings, for supreme prosperity.

sanskrit_text: यच्छेन्द्र पृणाति शत्रूंर्यथा स नरः स वृषः ।
transliteration: yac chendra pṛṇāti śatrūn yathā sa naraḥ sa vṛṣaḥ ||
translation_english: Just as a valiant man, even a bull, scatters his enemies, so may Indra fill us with strength.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रेणैव युज्यमाना वाजेश्च वर्धताम् ।
transliteration: indreṇai va yujyamānā vājeś ca vardhatām ||
translation_english: May we increase in might and wealth while being yoked with Indra’s power.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्रेहि मत्स्यन्धसो विश्वेभि: सोमपर्वभि: महाँ अभिष्टिरोजसा ॥
transliteration: indrehi matsyandhaso viśvebhiḥ somaparvabhiḥ mahāṃ abhiṣṭirojasā ||
translation_english: Come, Indra, delighting in Soma at all the feasts; mighty in strength obtain victory over foes.

sanskrit_text: एमेनं सृजता सुते मन्दिमिन्द्राय मन्दिने चक्रिं विश्वानि चक्रये ॥
transliteration: emenaṃ sṛjatā sute mandim indrāya mandine cakriṃ viśvāni cakraye ||
translation_english: Pour forth this exhilaration pressed out for Indra, the accomplisher of all deeds.

sanskrit_text: मत्स्वा सुशिप्र मन्दिभि: स्तोमेभिर्विश्वचर्षणे सचैषु सवनेष्वा ॥
transliteration: matsvā suśipra mandibhiḥ stomebhir viśvacarṣaṇe sacaīṣu savaneṣvā ||
translation_english: Indra, rejoicing in the praise offered by worthy singers in the ritual songs.

sanskrit_text: तं देवानां वरुणो मित्रश्चास्मान् युधि विजिगीषुदि॥
transliteration: taṃ devānāṃ varuṇo mitraścāsmān yudhi vijigīṣudi ||
translation_english: May Varuṇa and Mitra stand with us as allies in battle and help us conquer.

sanskrit_text: इन्द्र वाजं वर्धय वसूनि च वर्धय प्र जासु वर्धय ॥
transliteration: indra vājaṃ vardhaya vasūni ca vardhaya prajāsu vardhaya ||
translation_english: O Indra, increase our might, bring us wealth, and prosper our progeny.

sanskrit_text: अस्मान्त्सु तत्र चोदयेन्द्र राये रभस्वतः तुविद्युम्न यशस्वतः ॥
transliteration: asmānts tu tatra codaye ndra rāye rabhasvataḥ tuvidyumna yaśasvataḥ ||
translation_english: In us arouse zeal, energy, splendour and glorious fame, O Indra.

sanskrit_text: सं गोमदिन्द्र वाजवदस्मे पृथु श्रवो बृहत् विश्वायुर्धेह्यक्षितम् ॥
transliteration: saṃ gomad indra vājavadasme pṛthu śravo bṛhat viśvayur dhehy akṣitam ||
translation_english: Grant us, O Indra, vast glory and might as wide as universal life, indestructible.

sanskrit_text: अस्मे धेहि श्रवो बृहद् द्युम्नं सहस्रसातमम् इन्द्र ता रथिनीरिषः ॥
transliteration: asme dhehi śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ sahasrasātamam indra tā rathinīriṣaḥ ||
translation_english: Bestow upon us vast glory and brilliance a thousand‑fold, O Indra, you who harness your chariot.

sanskrit_text: वसोरिन्द्रं वसुपतिं गीर्भिर्गृणन्त ऋग्मियम् होम गन्तारमूतये ॥
transliteration: vasor indraṃ vasupatiṃ gīrbhir gṛṇanta ṛgmiyam | homa gantāram ūtaye ||
translation_english: We invoke Indra, lord of wealth, with sacred hymns that he may go forth as our guardian.

sanskrit_text: सुतेसुते न्योकसे बृहद्बृहत एदिरः इन्द्राय शूषमर्चति ॥
transliteration: sutesute nyokase bṛhad bṛhat édiraḥ indrāya śūṣam arcati ||
translation_english: In every pressing, the mighty one praises Indra with rich libations and hymns.
